title: [Solindago Anox, Crosspaths]
description: Three paths lined in white gravel that gleams with bits of crushed shell lead to the north, west and east.  The zoo's front entrance can be glimpsed through a massive stone arch.  An enormous circular planter sits in the center of the crossroads.  Cleverly built into the edge of the planter, wooden benches offer a pleasant place to sit and enjoy the colorful blooms.

Three paths lined in white gravel that gleams with bits of crushed shell lead to the north, west and east.  The zoo's front entrance can be glimpsed through a massive stone arch.  An enormous circular planter sits in the center of the crossroads.  Cleverly built into the edge of the planter, wooden benches offer a pleasant place to sit and enjoy the evening air.
